https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/project-bonsai/
Project Bonsai PREVIEW A machine teaching service for creating intelligent industrial control systems using simulations
Machine teaching for intelligent control systems Build and manage autonomous systems that are explainable, auditable, reusable, and trustworthy without needing advanced data science skills. Project Bonsai is available in preview.
Machine teaching service for building intelligence into control systems and optimizing it without knowing data science or AI
Simulator integration supports leading industrial simulators in engineering, manufacturing, energy, robotics, and supply chain
Custom deployment modes to fit your operational needs—on the cloud, at the edge, or on a device
Integrated dashboard to build, train, debug, inspect, and deploy AI models for intelligent control systems
Build intelligent control systems Help machinery and processes adapt in real time to changing conditions. Use advanced AI techniques like machine teaching and deep reinforcement learning to solve complex problems across manufacturing, process control/optimization, logistics, and energy management.
Explore autonomous systems Create with AI using your expertise Use your team’s subject matter expertise to accelerate the development of tailored control systems—no data science experience required. Build the AI “brains” that power these autonomous systems through a combination of machine teaching, reinforcement learning, simulation, and deployment capabilities.
Learn more about machine teaching Deploy and manage on your terms Deploy intelligent controllers to the cloud, at the edge, or on a device—whichever best fits your operational needs—while maintaining control and clear understanding of your autonomous systems.
Learn about getting started
